root.name: Metal Slug 5
root.description: OverviewFifth game in the Metal Slug franchise, Metal Slug 5 was released for the MVS arcade platform in 2003. The game was ported along with Metal Slug 4 to the PlayStation 2 and the Xbox. It was also a part of the Metal Slug Anthology collection. Gameplay This time around players must fight against the Ptolemaic Army, who stole secret documents concerning the Metal Slug projects. The game presents new backgrounds, all hand drawn specially for the game as well as new settings. Players get to chose from four different characters: Â Marco, Tarma, Eri or Fio.

similar_games.game: Contra Advance: The Alien Wars EX
